bdi4jade.extension.planselection.utilitybased

Class SoftgoalPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<java.util.Map<Softgoal,java.lang.Double>>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable

    public class SoftgoalPreferences
extends TransientBelief<java.util.Map<Softgoal,java.lang.Double>>
    This is an agent transient belief (@see TransientBelief) that stores the preferences for softgoals.
    Author:
    ingrid
